name: chlorophyll
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in sunshine.
flavor_text.platinum: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in sunshine.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in sunshine.
